entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
